name: Applepicker
description:
Applepicker is a game made for the VimJam game jam. In this game, you play as an apple farmer who must collect 15 apples in a certain amount of time and bring them back to the shop to sell. After each wave of customers buys the apples, the time limit will decrease, leaving you with less time to pick the apples.  See what wave you can get up to (there is an end)! 

Note: This was made in a short period of time for a game jam. I apologise for any bugs.
